author: rooneg
msg: Merge r476443 from trunk into the 0.2.0-incubating branch.

author: jleroux
msg: This is a first version for "POS Cash/Paid in and out of drawer" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-237)
It is designed as proposed by Ray but without a specialised dialog box for the comment wich is for the moment directly entered in "command line" as for the amount.
There are still some points to think about/enhance :
. Adding a specialised dialog box (with seed data and perhaps a mechanism to update these data)
. Manage links with X and Z reports
. Verify link with accounting (I added types in AccontingTypeData.xml, not sure yet of that point)

author: stefano
msg: fixing the URL (they still point to the incubator URLs)
